raw_comment: Texting eludes to like of men, thou fingers do not rest upon the silky smooth, glassy surface of thy phones. No messages find their way to their children's father and mother.  Though women articulate their fingers gracefully across the keyboard and scribe down messages to their ancestors. Long distances voice talks occur most in women. Thou parents must hither their poor sons to talk across thy magic voice box.
ace_sentences: The fingers of men do not rest on the smooth glass surface of phones.
Men do not send messages to the father of their children.
Men do not send messages to the mother of their children.
Women move their fingers gracefully across a keyboard.
Women write messages to their ancestors.
Long-distance voice calls occur more often among women than among men.
Parents must encourage their sons to talk on a phone.
